txt.en: Orc-camps lie to the north-west and south of Aldburg.\n\nArcil would like you to assess the threat posed to the Eastfold by scouting the nearby Orc-camps.
'It appears that the White Hand number far fewer than the unknown Orcs, as I thought they might.\n\n'Let us first focus upon ridding the Eastfold of one threat, then we will deal with the other.'
Arcil is in the Mead Hall of Aldburg.\n\nYou scouted the Orc-camps and now have a better idea of their number. You should return to Aldburg and convey this information to Arcil.
The Orcs present in this camp are aggressive and many
This camp contains a small group of weary White Hand Orcs
This camp contains a small group of enervated White Hand Orcs
You have joined Arcil in his assessment that the unknown Orc-tribe is the more dangerous.

'It is clear that we cannot stand idly by and allow these Orcs to dictate the engagement of battle. I would like for us to scout their forces to learn what we are facing here.

'[placeholder], what I ask of you will put you in great peril, but I am confident that you are up to the task. Scout the camps that the Orcs have established near Aldburg and learn their number.

'There are camps north-west of the city, and rumours of another camp to the south have recently been brought to my attention. Be careful.'
